title: futanari
body:
A female character with male genitalia.

In the context of Danbooru, the image does not need to directly show whether or not they have female genitalia. If you can visually confirm the lack of a [[pussy|vagina]], tag [[futa without pussy]]. If you can visually confirm a vagina, [[penis]], and [[testicles]], tag [[full-package futanari]].

It is [b]not[/b] related to real transgender or intersex, but is a purely fantasy-based depiction of hermaphroditism.

Futanari is not to be tagged with either [[hetero]], [[yuri]] or [[yaoi]].

h4. Related tags

h6. Pairings

* [[futa with female]]
* [[futa with male]]
** [[futa on male]]
** [[male on futa]]
* [[futa with futa]]
* [[futa with newhalf]]

h6. Types 

* [[full-package futanari]]: penis, vagina, & testicles
* [[intravaginal futanari]]: penis coming out of vagina
* [[futa without pussy]]: penis, testicles, no vagina

h6. Other

* [[ejaculating while penetrated]]
* [[futanari pov]]
* [[futasub]]
* [[huge clitoris]]
* [[penis growth]]
* [[pseudopenis]]

h4. See also

* [[cuntboy]]: male body with a vagina only
* [[male futanari]]: male body with a vagina and penis
* [[genderswap]]: male-to-female/futanari

h4. External Links

* "Wikipedia: Futanari":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/futanari

title: o_gundam:_hikari_no_newtype
body:
[b][i]Mobile Suit O Gundam: Newtype's Light[/i][/b] is a hoax [[1980s (style)|80s]] new [[Gundam]] series story published in [[out (magazine)|"Out" Magazine]] in early 1986 detailing a supposed sequel to [[Zeta Gundam]]. It was a hoax made to promote the real sequel to Zeta Gundam, [[Gundam ZZ]].

Not to be confused with the manga [i]Outer Gundam[/i], which can also be referred to as O Gundam.

h4. New mecha

* [[O Gundam]]
* [[Psycho Gundam Mk IV]]

h4. External links

* "Japanese Wikipedia article":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A9%9F%E5%8B%95%E6%88%A6%E5%A3%ABO%E3%82%AC%E3%83%B3%E3%83%80%E3%83%A0]
* "Gundam wiki article":[https://gundam.fandom.com/wiki/Mobile_Suit_O_Gundam:_Newtype%27s_Light]
other_names: 機動戦士Oガンダム光のニュータイプ

title: azuchi_momo
body:
A former [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual YouTuber|VTuber]], part of Nijisanji SEEDs first batch. Originally designed by [[Moeki Yuuta]], subsequently redesigned by [[Yuuki (irodo rhythm)|]]. Following her redesign, she unlisted all her videos featuring her [[Azuchi Momo (old design)|old model]]. Graduated on January 31, 2024. 

h4. Costumes

h5. Official costumes with a model

* !post #7162916: [[Azuchi Momo (old design)|Old design]]
* !asset #30703179: [[Azuchi Momo (1st costume)|Default]]
* !post #5116476: [[Azuchi Momo (2nd costume)|2nd costume]]: Queen of Hearts
* !post #7162805: [[Azuchi Momo (3rd costume)|3rd costume]]: Loungewear

h5. Costumes shared with other Nijisanji livers

* !asset #30698309: [[Nijisanji Fes t-shirt]]: Green class

title: mizukai_crisis
body:
[b]Turtle Island: Uncharted Waters[br]Water Monsters Crisis - The Floating Island of Innocents[/b]
[quote]A clear blue sky, fluffy white clouds, and a vast ocean that spreads as far as the eye can see. Is it already time for another tumultuous summer event!?

The excitement is short-lived, however, as this mysterious new island they discover sits in uncharted waters. It is, at least, definitely on Earth.

The story begins when Chaldea comes across some peculiar squishy creatures, a talking sea turtle, and a pair of girls claming to be their protectors. It seems strange, dangerous sea monsters have been preying upon the squishy creatures of the island, which has been taken over, leaving only a makeshift village floating over the water.

"With your help, we may be able to go on the offensive. Then we might be able to truly take the island back."

Now, to reclaim what was taken, Master (and the squishies) leap into action![/quote]

A limited time event in [[Fate/Grand Order]], released on the Japanese server on April 6, 2022 and on the NA server on March 29, 2024. [[Taisui Xingjun (fate)|]] is given as a reward to players for completing the event.

title: bennett_(genshin_impact)
body:
[[Genshin Impact]] character.

A young adventurer of the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild who seems to always find himself tangled up in baffling bouts of bad luck. He is the only active member of his own adventure group, known as "Benny's Adventure Team," after all the other members decided to "take leave" following a series of unfortunate incidents. As a result, the team is currently on the verge of being dissolved. Unable to break the poor boy's heart, Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild has kept "Benny's Adventure Team" on the books, whilst also hiding from him the fact that all the other members have long since officially left the team.

h4. Appearance

title: welf_crozzo
body:
A [[dungeon ni deai wo motomeru no wa machigatteiru darou ka|DanMachi]] character. Welf Crozzo is a member of the [[Hestia]] Familia and [[Bell Cranel]]'s personal smith, later becoming one for the entire Hestia Familia after converting from the Hephaestus Familia.

Welf is a tall adult male who has [[short hair|short]], [[spiked hair|spiky]] [[red hair]] and dark [[blue eyes]]. He wears a [[blue scarf]] around his neck. His attire consists of a dark [[blue shirt|blue]] [[long sleeves|long-sleeve]] shirt underneath a [[black kimono]] with a [[brown belt]] tied around his waist along with tanned [[white pants]] and long [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]]. Welf is a straightforward and honest person.

h4. External links

* "DanMachi Wiki: Welf Crozzo":https://danmachi.fandom.com/wiki/Welf_Crozzo

title: alice_guo
body:
Former politician and mayor of the [[Philippines|Philippine]] city of Bamban, Tarlac, accused of being a spy for the Chinese government.

Has spawned various memes made by Filipino netizens related to her, such as her having a big resemblance to the late Taiwanese actress Barbie Hsu.

title: tsunomaki_watame
body:
A [[Virtual YouTuber|VTuber]] and member of [[hololive]]'s 4th generation, also called [[holoForce]]. Designed by [[Fuumi (radial engine)|]] and rigged by [[Keffiy]].

She is a [[sheep girl]] with [[purple eyes]], [[very long hair|very long]] [[blonde hair]], [[sheep horns]], [[sheep ears|ears]], [[sheep tail|tail]], and [[large breasts]]. Her default hairstyle is a [[half up half down braid]] that turns into a [[short ponytail]] (although  since she's rarely seen from the back it's often portrayed as a simple [[half up braid]]) and an [[ahoge]]. She also wears a pink [[hairclip]].

title: flexible
body:

title: salome_(fate)
body:
Berserker-class Servant seen in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. A biblical figure who was the daughter of Herod II and Herodias. At a grand banquet, and at her mother's behest, Salome made a request to Herod Antipas; the head of John the Baptist given to her on a platter, which was thus brought to her.

In Fate/Grand Order, she is depicted as a somewhat [[yandere]] woman, and her dialogue reveals that she fell in love with John the Baptist, which she says was the reason for her request to "stay" together with him. [spoiler]In fact, the skull that she wields is actually of John the Baptist's with his soul still inside. John treated himself as a half-reluctant mentor who seems to be used to Salome's antics.[/spoiler] She has a [[mole on breast|mole on her right breast]].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Simosi]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Bridcutt Sarah Emi]]

h4. Appearance

title: ichinose_shiki
body:
An [[iDOLMASTER Cinderella Girls|iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls]] character in the Cute category.

Shiki is a curious 18 y.o. girl who can be described only as "a mad scientist". She loves experiments, and is motivated by finding new things to hold her attention; if it's not interesting, she's not interested. Rather than being scouted by Producer, she chose him as part of one of her experiments. She sniffed the Producer and his smell convinced her that he was the right one for the experiment. She became an idol for this reason.

It's implied she uses pheromones to attract fans, and even in idol form, her hair looks messy and uncombed.

In the 11th Magic Hour SP, she revealed that she went to an American university before being an idol, but she got bored of it and returned to Japan. She attends a Japanese high school and lives on her own. She likes tabasco sauce and her forte is chemistry, but she dislikes wasabi and waking up early.

In the tie in Cinderella Girls Theater skits, Shiki is introduced by [[Yanagi Kiyora]]. Her sniffing habits show up as early as her first line and her “Nyahaha” laugh appeared soon after. She seems to be friends with [[Sagisawa Fumika]] and [[Jougasaki Mika]], who both also know of her nose. Her smelling often causes her to fall asleep and she highly regards the Producer’s jacket as a source of soothing smells. Shiki got a job as a background character in a Wild West film.

Due to her popularity, she was selected for the 8th set of CINDERELLA MASTER CD series, alongside [[Tachibana Arisu]], [[Shiomi Syuko]], [[Katagiri Sanae]], and [[Sakurai Momoka]]. She is voiced by [[Aihara Kotomi]].

body:
[i]Hoshiguma, member of the Special Service of Lungmen Guard Department, is awaiting your orders.[/i]

A playable Defender Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]

      [td]184 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]7 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

An elite Operator from the Special Ops Team of the Lungmen Guard Department. She exhibited remarkable professionalism in handling violent crime, protecting VIPs, disaster response and emergency rescue. Currently a defender assisting Rhodes Island operations, she provides tactical execution and command support.

Uses a spinning triangular shield named [i][[Hannya_(Arknights)|Hannya]][/i].

Her character design bears somewhat of a resemblance to [[Hoshiguma Yuugi]] from [[Touhou]], but her horn is off-center, as if the horn meant to be on the other side of her head is missing. Moreover, their names are also a reference to one of [[Shuten Douji (Mythology)|Shuten-doji's]] top lieutenants.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Yasuno Kiyono]] (JP), Cai Xinchun (CN, former), Chen Yu (CN, current), Shi Xin (Cantonese), Meaghan Martin (EN) and Lee Sae-byeok (KR). Her designer is [[Infukun]].

title: glory_of_deep_skies
body:
Touhou Mukyuushi ~ Glory of Deep Skies is a fan-made [[Touhou|Touhou Project]] game by Τeam αlternative Σnding using the Touhou Danmakufu ph3 shooting game engine. It was programmed by Kirbio, Gizmo the Dragon, Aka Kyuketsuki, and Lunarethic. The main game features 4 stages, with three separate versions of Stage 3 that must all be cleared to unlock Stage 4, and two playable characters with two shot types each. The extra stage was released April 26th. 

h4. External links

* "Touhou Wiki: Glory of Deep Skies":https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Glory_of_Deep_Skies

title: handala
body:
A character created in 1969 by political cartoonist Naji al-Ali as a personification of the [[palestine|Palestinian]] people, identity and resistance. He is depicted as a [[bald]] [[child]] with few hair strands, wearing a [[patchwork clothes|patchwork shirt]], and always [[facing away]] with [[arms behind back]].

The name comes from the Arabic word for the colocynth (حنظل, [i]ḥanẓal[/i]), a perennial plant native to the Levant which bears bitter fruit, grows back when cut, and has deep roots.

title: gigile
body:
An [[alien]] creature from the [[Macross 7]] science fiction series from the 90s.

[b]Gigile[/b] (ギギル [i]Gigiru[/i]) is the rude looking, big, bald (and very violent) humanoid [[cyborg]] [[Protodeviln]] commander of the [[Varauta]] army. 

Unlike his peers he uses a [[variable fighter]]. His [[mecha]] of choice is the [[Fz-109F]].

title: subway_surfers
body:
A 2012 endless runner mobile game co-developed by Kiloo and SYBO games for [[iOS (os)|]], [[Android (os)|]], [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] Phone and [[Amazon (company)|]] [[Amazon Kindle|Fire Tablet]]. With over 4 billion downloads, Subway Surfers is one of the most downloaded mobile games of all time. 

In game, the player takes control of [[graffiti]] artists who upon getting caught in the act of tagging a [[subway station]], must run through the [[railroad tracks|tracks]] to escape the Guard and his dog. Along the way, they can collect [[coin]]s and various [[power-up]]s while simutaneously dodging collisions with the [[subway]]s or other objects.

h4. Characters

* [[Frank (subway surfers)|]]
* [[Jake (subway surfers)|]]
* [[Tasha (subway surfers)|]]

h4. External links

* "Official website":https://subwaysurfers.com/
* "Subway Surfers Wiki":https://subwaysurf.fandom.com/
* "Wikipedia: Subway Surfers":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Subway_Surfers

title: oda_kippoushi_(fate)
body:
A male aspect of the Avenger-class [[oda_nobunaga_(fate)|Oda Nobunaga]] that appears in [i][[Fate/Grand Order]][/i], intended to represent the "Great Fool of Owari" era of the daimyo's life. This aspect is referred to by Nobunaga's birthname, "Kippoushi", as it is the name he was known under during the time he was active. He appears as the collective's second ascension, following regular Nobunaga and preceding [[oda nobunaga (maou avenger) (fate)|her older "Demon King" self]].

He retains the [[red eyes]] and [[black hair]] of his counterparts, as well as their black [[peaked cap]] and [[Oda uri]]. Unlike the other two forms, this Nobunaga wears a green [[crop top]] with a [[single sleeve]] and armorless [[black footwear|black]] [[boots]]. Also exclusive to this form is a long, messy [[ponytail]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #6585941
* !post #9038537: [[Oda Kippoushi (Sengoku Freestyle) (fate)|Sengoku Freestyle]]

title: eimi_isami
body:
[[Hamster girl]] [[virtual YouTuber]] from [[Phase Connect]]'s third generation, Euphoria.

h4. Appearance
* !post #7071189: Reference sheet

She is a [[hamster girl]] with [[curly hair|curly]] [[orange hair]], [[pink eyes]] and [[small breasts]].

Her default costume consists of a loose-fitting [[lab coat]] with attached [[ID card]] over a [[black shirt|black]]-[[two-tone shirt|and]]-[[white shirt|white]] [[crop top]] with an [[orange ribbon]], a [[black skirt]] and [[white shoes|white]] [[sneakers]] with [[loose socks|baggy]] [[kneehighs|knee-high]] [[white socks]]. She also has [[bandaid on leg|bandaids on her right knee and left thigh]].

Her default hairstyle is a [[short hair|short]] [[bob cut]] with a [[high ponytail]] tied with a [[black scrunchie]].

title: tekken
body:
A series of 3D fighting games from [[Namco]], later [[Bandai Namco]]. While set in a modern world, the franchise features a wide variety of fighters ranging from traditional martial artists to fantastical beings.

Notable for having most characters voiced by voice actors from their respective native country, albeit they can understand each other with no language barrier problem.

title: noir_corne_(arknights)
body:
[i]Noir Corne, Defender Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide a solid defense for the squad.[/i]

A playable Defender Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Higashi[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]August 30[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Oni[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]180 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]8 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A veteran defender of Rhodes Island's Op Team A4.

He keeps a huge collection of masks, which he wears depending on the occasion. Though he has no secret to hide behind them.

[spoiler]A former assassin of Higashi. During a mission he fought [[Yato (arknights)|]], who was working for the enemy side, but then chose to flee the war-torn country together and join Rhodes Island.[/spoiler]

His [[voice actor]]s are [[Kawanishi Kengo]] (JP), Zhaokun Liu (CN), Ben Cura (EN) and Ryu Seung-gon (KR). His original illustrator is [[Ryuuzaki Ichi]], while his alternate form is drawn by [[Jiuri Jiuhao]].

h4. Appearance
* !post #5668711: Default

h6. [[Rathalos S Noir Corne (arknights)|]]
* !post #6123243: Default
* !post #6123247: Elite II
other_names: ノイルホーン(アークナイツ)

title: yato_(arknights)
body:
[i]Yato, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will fight on the battlefield to give the squad the upper hand.[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Higashi[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]May 14[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Oni[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]161 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]8 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

Leader of Rhodes Island's Op Team A4 and cornerstone of the company. Her skin is sensitive to sunlight, so she wears a [[mask]] and usually works at night.

She is known to complete her missions swiftly and efficiently, but at the cost of disregarding her teamates' opinions and damaging herself.

[spoiler]A former assassin of Higashi. During a mission she fought [[Noir Corne (arknights)|]], who was working for the enemy side, but then chose to flee the war-torn Higashi together and join Rhodes Island.[/spoiler]

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Fujita Saki]] (Japanese), Hou Xiaofei (Chinese), Jessica McDonald (English), and Woo Jeong-sin (Korean). Her original art designer is [[Skade]].

h4. Appearance 

* !post #5619169: Default
* !post #6124282: Updated Art

h6. [[Kirin R Yato (arknights)|]]

* !post #6123230: Default
* !post #6123236: Elite II

title: ningirsu_(yu-gi-oh!)
body:
An umbrella tag for variations of the [[Yu-Gi-Oh!]] [[duel monster]] Beckoned by the World Chalice who was originally printed in 2017 and has received new forms throughout the years. 

He has developed a reputation of being a [[siscon]] among the Yu-Gi-Oh fanart community because of his canon obsession with bringing [[Ib_(Yu-Gi-Oh!)|Ib]] back to life.

h4. Forms

* [[Beckoned by the World Chalice]] - The original version, he wears [[goggles around neck|goggles around his neck]] and a [[headband]].
* [[Longirsu the Orcust Orchestrator]] - An older version of Ningirsu.
* [[Girsu the Orcust Mekk-Knight]] - The robotic form of Longirsu.

title: dc_comics
body:
[b]DC Comics[/b] is one of the largest and oldest [[united_states|American]] [[comic]] book publishing houses, founded in 1934. Rival to [[Marvel]] Comics (even though both release crossover comics from time to time).

The majority of its publications take place within the DC Universe and feature numerous iconic superheroes and villains, including [[Superman]], [[Batman]], [[Wonder Woman]], [[The Flash]], [[Green Lantern]], and [[Aquaman (dc)|]].

title: abella_(fear_&_hunger)
body:
One of the playable characters and recruitable party members of [[Fear & Hunger 2: Termina]].

She has [[very long_hair|very long]] [[low-tied long hair|low-tied]] [[red hair]]. She wears [[yellow overalls]] over a [[brown tank top]], along with [[brown boots]].

[spoiler]Her moonscorched form is the [[Chaugnar (Fear & Hunger)|Chaugnar]].[/spoiler]

title: karin_(fear_&_hunger)
body:
One of the playable characters and recruitable party members of [[Fear & Hunger 2: Termina]].

She has [[long_hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] with [[roots (hair)|roots]], tied in a [[ponytail]]. She wears an [[open jacket|open]] [[brown jacket|brown]] [[oversized jacket|oversized]] [[bomber jacket]] over a [[black shirt]] or [[sweater]], a [[purple skirt]], [[pantyhose]], and [[black shoes]].

[spoiler]Her moonscorched form is the [[Valkyrie (Fear & Hunger)|Valkyrie]].[/spoiler]

title: chloe_park
body:
A character from [[We Bare Bears]] and the deuteragonist.

Chloe is a 10-year old Korean girl who is friends with the Bears and is very intelligent, as she is a child prodigy in college. She is also shy and socially awkward, having a hard time opening up to people, though she is rather open to people she gets to know.

Chloe is a young girl with [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] in a [[bob cut]], [[blunt bangs]], [[black eyes]] and has large [[red-framed eyewear|red]] [[glasses]]. She wears a [[blue hoodie]] with a [[drawstring]], [[brown pants]], [[white socks]] and a pair of [[red shoes]].

h4. External links

* "We Bare Bears Wiki: Chloe Park":https://webarebears.fandom.com/wiki/Chloe_Park

title: charlie_(we_bare_bears)
body:
A character from [[We Bare Bears]] and the tritagonist.

Charlie is friends with the Bear brothers and is very loud, friendly and eccentric. Since he is a fabled creature, many people disrupt his daily life for photos, which causes him to grow a fear of humans.

Charlie is an anthropomorphic [[bigfoot]] and is very tall. He has a [[mustache]] and is covered in dark [[green fur]], though this was later revealed to be when he is dirty. When cleaned up, his fur is actually bright [[orange fur|orange]].

h4. External links

* "We Bare Bears Wiki: Charlie":https://webarebears.fandom.com/wiki/Charlie_(character)

title: new_super_marisa_land
body:
"魔理沙と6つのキノコ ~New Super Marisa Land~" ([i]Marisa to Muttsu no Kinoko[/i], Marisa and 6 Mushrooms)

The follow-up to Tasofro's [[Touhou]] doujin title, スーパーマリサランド (Super Marisa Land), featuring [[Kirisame Marisa]]. It is a platforming game similar to the Nintendo's [[Mario (series)|Mario series]] and heavily borrows gameplay elements from it.

h4. See also

* [[Invincible Marisa]]
* [[Super Marisa World]]

h4. External links

* "Touhou Wiki: New Super Marisa Land":https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/New_Super_Marisa_Land

title: ice_bear_(we_bare_bears)
body:
A character from [[We Bare Bears]] and one of the three main protagonists. 

Ice Bear is the youngest of the Bear brothers. Despite being emotionless, stoic and quiet, he is the most mature and polite. He is undoubtly the strongest and smartest of his brothers and is quick to defend them if necessary. He is also interested in physical activities and the cold, as he sleeps in the [[refrigerator]]. Ice Bear refers to himself in third-person.

Ice Bear is an anthropomorphic [[polar bear]] and is covered in [[white fur]]. He is taller than both [[Grizzly (we bare bears)|]] and [[Panda (we bare bears)|]].

h4. External links

* "We Bare Bears Wiki: Ice Bear":https://webarebears.fandom.com/wiki/Ice_Bear

title: panda_(we_bare_bears)
body:
A character from [[We Bare Bears]] and one of the three main protagonists. 

Panda is the middle brother of the Bear brothers. He is tender-hearted, artistic creative and gentle, though he is also insecure and quite cowardly. He always has a [[phone]] in his hands and is very knowledgable with technology, anime and Asian culture. Panda is also quite talented in drawing, most notably [[comic|manga]].

Panda is an anthropomorphic [[panda]] and is covered in [[black fur|black]] and [[white fur]]. He is shorter than both [[Ice Bear (we bare bears)|]] and [[Grizzly (we bare bears)|]].

h4. External links

* "We Bare Bears Wiki: Panda":https://webarebears.fandom.com/wiki/Panda_Bear

title: grizzly_(we_bare_bears)
body:
A character from [[We Bare Bears]] and one of the three main protagonists. 

Grizzly is the oldest of the Bear brothers and their leader. He is outgoing, boisterous, optimistic and outdoorsy. He is very social and loves making friends, and is also quite gluttonous, being able to eat large amounts of [[food]] very quickly.

Grizzly is an anthropomorphic [[brown bear|grizzly bear]] and is covered in [[brown fur]]. He is in the middle in terms of height, being taller than [[Panda (we bare bears)|]] and shorter than [[Ice Bear (we bare bears)|]].

h4. External links

* "We Bare Bears Wiki: Grizzly":https://webarebears.fandom.com/wiki/Grizzly_Bear

title: livewire
body:
A character from [[DC Comics]]. 

An "electrokinetic":[/wiki_pages/electrokinesis] adversary of [[Superman]] and associated characters. First debuted in [[Superman: The Animated Series]] before being adapted into mainline continuity in [[2006]].

title: admiral_brickell
body:
Admiral Brickell is a hero who first appears in [[bloons_tower_defense|Bloons TD 6]]. She is the tenth “hero” character to be released for that game generation.
Like most Bloons characters she's a [[monkey_girl|monkey]] with dark [[thick_eyebrows|thick eyebrows]] and [[brown_fur|brown fur]]. 
Her default outfit consists of a navy-colored [[naval_uniform|naval uniform]] with golden stripes complimenting her rank, beneath a [[peaked_cap|peaked cap]] she has long [[grey_hair|grey hair]] tied in a [[low_ponytail|low ponytail]].

title: mio_(beast_lord)_(arknights)
body:
An NPC introduced in the [[Arknights]] Side Story [i]Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun[/i].

Not to be confused with the swordswoman [[Mio (arknights)|Mio]].

title: emperor_(arknights)
body:
A non-playable character in [[Arknights]], one of the [i]Beast Lords[/i].

He is an [[emperor penguin|emperor]] [[penguin]] who appears to be minimally anthropomorphic. Despite this, he can talk, as well as "hold and fire a handgun":[/posts/3842621] (though his preferred sidearm is fake and only fires rubber bullets.)

He typically wears a white [[beanie]], [[sunglasses]], multiple [[gold necklace]]s, and a T-shirt depicting [[Tupac Shakur]]—spelled "Topac" on the shirt and in the game script, presumably to avoid legal issues.

Judging by his coloration and build, he is in fact a king penguin, not an emperor penguin.

He is both a world-famous rapper and hip-hop producer known as "the rap god of Columbia", and the CEO and founder of [[Penguin Logistics (Arknights)|Penguin Logistics]]. He is also frequently depicted alongside [[Magallan (Arknights)|Magallan]] in fanart due to her penguin motif and the in-game lore revealing that the two are good friends.

The Emperor is voiced by [[Tsuda Kenjirou]], while his English singing voice is done by American rapper Substantial.

title: shigure_ui_(vtuber)_(young)
body:
An [[aged down]] version of [[Shigure Ui (Vtuber)|]].

It originally started as a throwaway joke over an illustration Ui drew of a younger version of herself, until she lost a bet against [[Nijisanji]]'s [[Kenmochi Touya]], and was forced to do a stream pretending to be a little girl on-stream using the said illustration as a static avatar on February 2020. It became a running joke on her channel from then on, ultimately debuting a Live2D model for April Fools 2020, and her occasionally doing "Loli Ui" streams with either the static or Live2D avatar, until it got a full 3D model on September 10th, 2023.

She wears a [[school uniform]] consisting of a [[white shirt|white]] [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[collared shirt|collared]] [[dress shirt]] with a [[red bowtie]], a [[blue dress|blue]] [[pleated dress|pleated]] [[pinafore dress]], [[white socks|white]] [[kneehighs]] and [[white shoes|white]] [[uwabaki]]. She also carries a [[red bag|red]] [[randoseru]] with a [[crime prevention buzzer]] and has a [[bandaid on knee|bandaid on her knee]].

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|hairstyle]] in this form is [[short hair]] tied into [[twintails]] with [[swept bangs]] and [[pom pom hair ornament]]s.

h4. Appearance

* !post #3760868: Profile

h4. See also

title: cosmos_(flower)
body:
[b]Cosmos[/b] are annual plants of the [i]Asteraceae[/i] family with [[daisy (flower)|]]-like [[flower]]s that sit atop long, slender stems with lacy foliage. Their colors and numbers of petals vary depending on the species, though most varieties have eight broad, usually notched or serrated petals. Their flowerheads may be bowl– or open cup–shaped. The leaves are simple, pinnate, or bipinnate, and arranged in opposite pairs.

Besides [i]Cosmos bipinnatus[/i], the garden cosmos or cosmea, other commonly depicted species are [i]C. sulphureus[/i] (yellow/sulfur cosmos) and [i]C. atrosanguineus[/i] (chocolate cosmos). Sulfur cosmos can be distinguished by their bright yellow, orange, or pale red colors; they also have a protruding center called a ray floret. And chocolate cosmos can be distinguished by their dark red to dark brown colors and wide protruding ray florets, somewhat reminiscent of [[zinnia]]s.

h4. Examples
* !asset #23586972: [i]Cosmos atrosanguineus[/i] (Chocolate cosmos)
* !asset #21233468: [i]Cosmos bipinnatus[/i] (Common/garden cosmos)
* !asset #23586937: [i]Cosmos sulphureus[/i] (Sulfur/yellow cosmos)
* !post #1864399: [[Chocolate cosmos]]
* !post #3698027: Garden cosmos

h4. Other Asteraceae species

title: rin's_pendant_(fate)
body:
A [[necklace]] featured in [[Fate/stay night]]. It is a family heirloom of the Tohsaka family which was used by [[Tohsaka Rin]] as a catalyst to summon her servant, [[Archer (fate)|]]. She later used its remaining magical energy near the start of the Grail War [spoiler]to revive [[Emiya Shirou]] after he was killed by [[Cu Chulainn (fate/stay night)|Lancer]][/spoiler], losing it in the process. Archer later goes back and retrieves it for her.

During [[Fate/Unlimited Blade Works]], [spoiler]Shirou reveals to Rin that he still has the pendant after his revival, meaning that the one Rin has is a duplicate. She realizes that this is because Archer has his own copy of the pendant he brought with him when summoned, because he held onto it until the moment he died. This revelation makes Rin realize Archer's true name.[/spoiler]

h4. Appearance
* !post #8971958

h4. External links
* "Type-Moon Wiki":https://typemoon.fandom.com/wiki/Rin_Tohsaka#Rin's_Pendant

Rin has [[blue eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] tied in a [[two side up]] hairdo. She often wears a red [[sweater]] with a white cross on the front, a [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[black skirt]] and [[black thighhighs]].

title: layered_bikini
body:
A [[bikini]] that has two or more discernible layers. A simple example involves wearing a highleg bikini as the lower layer, then a lowleg bikini as the upper layer, resulting in the sides of both being visible on the character's thighs, not to be confused with a [[ruffle bikini]].

If one of the layers is a [[one-piece swimsuit]], then also add the tag [[layered swimsuit]].

title: final_fantasy_vii_ever_crisis
body:
Final Fantasy VII: Ever Crisis is a role-playing mobile game developed by Applibot and Square Enix, available for Android and iOS. It is a planned retelling of the complete Compilation of [[Final Fantasy VII]], presented in the format of the original release of FF7.

Beyond featuring new narrative elements, such as expanding the story behind [i]The First Soldier[/i] (starring a younger [[Sephiroth (Ever Crisis)|Sephiroth]]), it also features tons of acquirable costumes for the characters that can be played.

h4. Ever Crisis Original Characters
* [[Glenn Lodbrok]]
* [[Lucia Lin]]
* [[Matt Winsord]]
* [[Alissa Goldie]]

title: barret_wallace
body:
Leader of the eco-terrorist group AVALANCHE in [i][[Final Fantasy VII]][/i], and featured in the Compilation.  Adoptive father of [[Marlene Wallace]].

A [[muscular male|muscular]], [[mature male]], Barret has [[dark-skinned male|dark skin]], [[very short hair|very short]] [[black hair]], a [[scar on cheek|scar on his cheek]] and a [[beard]].  Wears [[green pants]] and a [[brown vest]] with [[torn sleeves]], and a set of [[dog tags]].  On his left arm he has a [[arm tattoo|tattoo]] and his right arm was destroyed and replaced with a [[prosthetic weapon|prosthetic]] [[gun]].  As of [[Final Fantasy VII Remake]], he sometimes wears [[sunglasses]].

h4. Final Fantasy VII Remake Outfits

title: yuffie_kisaragi
body:
Playable [[ninja]] thief from [[Final Fantasy VII]], featured in the Compilation ([[final fantasy vii advent children|Advent Children]], [[before crisis final fantasy vii|Before Crisis]], [[crisis core final fantasy vii|Crisis Core]], [[dirge of cerberus final fantasy vii|Dirge of Cerberus]]), the [[Final Fantasy VII Remake|Remake]], and in the [[Kingdom Hearts]] series.

She has [[short hair|short]], [[black hair]] and either [[brown eyes|brown]] or [[grey eyes]]. She wears a [[crop top|cropped]] [[green shirt|green]] [[sleeveless turtleneck]] with [[shoulder armor]] and a [[single sleeve|single]] [[yellow sleeves|yellow sleeve]] over her left arm, leaving the other [[single bare shoulder|shoulder bare]]. She wears either [[yellow shorts|yellow]] or [[grey shorts|grey]] [[open fly|unbuttoned]] [[short shorts]], and has [[asymmetrical legwear]] consisting of [[leg armor]] and a [[fishnet thighhighs|fishnet thighhigh]] on her left leg, and [[leg warmers]] on both legs. She also wears a [[headband]], [[fishnet gloves]], [[orange gloves|orange]] [[fingerless gloves]] and [[orange shoes|orange]] [[sneakers]].

She wields a [[shuriken]] and is frequently in possession of [[materia]].

title: milsiril
body: A character from [[Dungeon Meshi]], and [[Kabru]]'s adopted mother. She trained him to be an expert swordfighter when he expressed a desire to become an adventurer, but unfortunately that training was almost entirely restricted to methods for killing humanoids, not monsters. She has [[silver hair]] and [[brown eyes]] with [[no_pupils|hardly-visible pupils]], and quite a few scars on her [[scar_on_arm|arms]] and [[scar_on_leg|legs]].

title: toki_(blue_archive)
body:
A character from [[Blue Archive]] and the fifth member of Millennium's SOF brigade, [[Cleaning & Clearing (blue archive)|]], and a member of the SPTF (Super Phenomenon Task Force). Her full name is Asuma Toki.

Her callsign is "Zero Four". She makes use of a powered and heavily-armed exoskeleton called "Abī-Ešuḫ".

She has a [[blue halo]], [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] with [[blue hair|blue]] [[streaked hair|streaks]], and [[blue eyes]]. Her default hairstyle is a [[half up braid]] and a [[single hair bun]] held with a [[blue ribbon|blue]] [[hair ribbon]].

Her regular outfit is a [[tactical maid]] outfit consisting of a [[maid headdress]], a [[bun cover]], an [[earpiece]], a [[blue bowtie]], a [[skirt set]] consisting of a [[black shirt]] with [[juliet sleeves]] and a [[black skirt|black]] [[layered skirt]] consisting of [[miniskirt]] worn over a [[long skirt]] with a [[huge bow|huge]] [[back bow]], a [[white apron|white]] [[maid apron]], a [[chest harness]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]], [[elbow gloves]], a [[black belt]] with multiple [[belt pouch|pouches]], a [[thigh holster]] and [[white thighhighs|white]] [[high heel boots|high-heel]] [[thigh boots]].  Her personal weapon is based on the experimental [[H&K G11]] [[assault rifle]].

Voiced By: [[Ishikawa Yui]]
Original artist: [[DoReMi_(doremi4704)|]]

It consists of a [[cropped shirt|cropped]] [[black shirt|black]] [[off-shoulder shirt]], a [[white skirt|white]] [[white overalls|overall]] [[overall skirt|skirt]] with a [[paint stains]] and a [[side slit]], a [[black belt]], a [[two-sided jacket|two-sided]] [[green jacket|green]] [[hooded jacket]] with [[arm belt]]s and [[white shoes|white]] [[sneakers]]. She has [[black-framed eyewear|black-framed]] [[glasses]] and [[cat ears]] as optional accessories.

She has 2 [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyles]] with this costume:

* [[Long hair]] with [[parted bangs]] tied into [[low twintails]]

title: prince_of_wales_(azur_lane)
body:
[i][[Azur Lane]][/i]'s personification of the second [i]King George V[/i]-class battleship, HMS [i]Prince of Wales[/i] (53).
Character design by [[Enka (bcat)|]], voiced by [[Hashimoto Chinami (voice Actor)|]].

She is portrayed with [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] tied to a [[crown braid]] that turns into a [[half up braid]], [[red eyes]], and [[large breasts]].

Her outfit is virtually identical to her older sister [[King George V (Azur Lane)|]]: [[red cape]] with [[fur trim]], [[red jacket]], [[white shirt|white]] [[double-breasted]] [[shirt]], and a [[saber (weapon)|]] as melee sidearm. She differs in that she also has an [[aiguillette]], her [[thighhighs]] are [[white thighhighs|white]] instead of black, has no garter straps, and wears a [[black skirt|black]] [[pleated skirt]] instead of white.

Her [[rigging]] is also the same as her sister (three 356 mm main gun mounts and two 133 mm twin [[anti-aircraft gun|DP mounts]]) but her right side gun contains her real-life ship's badge.

h4. Skins

title: muten_roushi
body: Muten Roushi, or Kamesennin, is the master of the Turtle school of martial arts in the [[Dragon Ball]] universe. He is the creator of the legendary [[Kamehameha (dragon ball)|]] attack which would later become [[Son Goku]]'s signature technique, and is a notoriously [[pervert|dirty]] [[old man]].

title: sakra_devanam_(elsword)
body:
One of [[Ara Haan]]'s character classes. Her hair is long and [[low-tied long hair|tied at the base]] in a [[half up braid]] and an [[ahoge]]. She wears long sleeves, an orange [[miniskirt]], sheer [[pantyhose]] and [[white shoes]].

[i]Śakro devānām indraḥ[/i] is the title for Śakra, the ruler of the Trāyastriṃśa Heaven according to Buddhist cosmology. The title translates to "Sakra, Lord of the Devas". This class' Chinese name is 帝天, or "Emperor of the Heavens".

title: sakura_miko_(new_year)
body:
The 5th/New Years [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Sakura Miko]].

It's a [[sweet lolita]]/[[wa lolita]] costume consisting of a [[detached collar]]  with a [[pink ribbon|pink]] [[neck ribbon]] and [[pom pom (clothes)|pom poms]], a [[frilled kimono|frilled]] [[sleeveless kimono]], [[frilled sleeves|frilled]] [[white sleeves|white]]/[[pink sleeves|light pink]] [[detached sleeves]] a [[frilled skirt|frilled]] [[pleated skirt|pink]] [[underbust]] [[high waist skirt]] with several [[white skirt|white]] [[layered skirt|layers]] and a [[petticoat]] underneath, a [[taiyaki]]-[[food-themed bag|shaped]] [[handbag]] [[white socks|white]] [[tabi]] [[bobby socks]] and [[red footwear|red]] [[geta]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] with this costume, she has her [[long hair]] decorated with a [[frilled hairband|frilled]] [[white hairband|white]] [[lolita hairband]] with [[pom pom hair ornament]]s and [[hairclip]]s, tied into [[side braid]]s that turn into [[twintails]] with [[hair rings]].

title: nekomata_okayu_(poisonya_syndrome)
body:
The 5th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Nekomata Okayu]]. It was unveiled during her 1st solo 3D live [i]"Poisonya Syndrome"[/i].

It consists of a puffy  [[black headwear|black]] [[beret]] with a [[rose]] [[hat flower|attached]], a [[black choker]], a [[collared shirt|colalred]] [[black shirt|black]] [[cropped shirt|cropped]] [[sleeveless shirt]] with multiple [[heart cutout]]s on her left breast, a [[two-tone jacket|two-tone]] ([[green jacket|green]] and [[purple jacket|purple]]) [[cropped jacket]] with [[shoulder cutout]]s, a diagonal [[breast zipper|zipper across her breasts]], a heart-shaped [[see-through clothes|see-through]] window over her left breast and [[mismatched sleeves]] with one of them being made out of  [[see-through sleeves|see-through]] [[fishnet sleeves|fishnets]], [[black shorts]] with a [[purple skirt|purple]] [[see-through skirt|see-through]] [[overskirt]], black [[garter straps]], [[mismatched legwear|mismatched]] [[purple thighhighs|purple]] [[over-kneehighs]] and [[black boots|black]] [[knee boots|knee-high]] [[fold-over boots|fold-over]] [[lace-up boots]].

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] with this costume, she has her [[long hair]] in a [[half up braid]] with [[diagonal bangs]] (although most fan art still depicts her with [[medium hair]]).

h4. Appearance

title: transcoded
body:
A transcoded post is a [[video]] that has been encoded into a different format, or re-encoded in the same format at a different bitrate (also known as 'transrating') before uploading it to Danbooru. This is usually done for compatibility reasons, or to reduce the file size so it fits under the file size limit.

h4. Codecs 

Danbooru only supports the following file formats and codecs:
[table]
[tr][th]Container[/th][th]Video[/th][th]Audio[/th][/tr]
[tr][td]WebM[/td][td]VP8, VP9, AV1[/td][td]Vorbis, Opus[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]MP4[/td][td]AVC (H.264), HEVC (H.265), VP9, AV1[/td][td]MP3, AAC, Opus[/td][/tr]
[/table]

Furthermore, videos with 10-bit color (aka HDR), and videos with 4:4:4 chroma subsampling are also unsupported.

When uploading a transcoded video, please leave a comment which settings you've used for future reference, and if possible a link to the original file.

h4. External links

* "FFmpeg":[https://ffmpeg.org/] - a versatile and powerful command‐line program that decodes, encodes, and transcodes nearly any format.
* "Handbrake":[https://handbrake.fr/] - an open-source GUI program with cross-platform support.
* "VidCoder":[https://vidcoder.net/] - offers an alternate and slightly more simplified user interface for the Handbrake engine, aimed at Windows users.
* "Wikipedia: Transcoding":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transcoding]

title: nerissa_ravencroft_(new_year)
body:
The 2nd/New Year [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive English|hololive EN]]'s [[Nerissa Ravencroft]].

It consists of a [[black choker|black]] [[frilled choker]], a [[black kimono|black]] [[feather-trimmed kimono|feather-trimmed]] [[furisode]] with a  [[floral print kimono|floral]] [[floral print|print]] [[print kimono|theme]] and [[wide sleeves]] with a [[feather print]] giving the impression of wings, a [[white scarf]] [[fur scarf]], a [[black shawl]] with [[feather-trimmed shawl|feather]] and [[lace-trimmed shawl|lace trim]], [[black gloves|black]] [[lace gloves]], [[white socks|white]] [[tabi]] and [[black sandals|black]] [[geta]]. She also has a [[single earring|single]] [[flower knot]] [[tassel earrings|tassel earring]] and an optional [[blue umbrella|blue]] [[oil-paper umbrella]].

Her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] with this attire is [[medium hair|medium]]/[[long hair]] with [[blue hair]] [[streaked hair]] tied into a [[single hair bun]] with a [[nape braid|nape]] [[braid]] and [[sidelocks]], decorated with [[hair flower]]s and multiple [[hairclip]]s.

h4. Appearance

title: rurine_luna
body:
A [[Virtual YouTuber]] from [[WACTOR Production]]. She's a girl born from the moonlight, thanks to the howling of [[wolf|wolves]] and their love for the [[moon]]. Her fans are called "[[lomito_(rurine_luna)|Lomitos]]", an endearing way to call dogs, which rhymes with the Spanish diminutive for wolves.

She has [[blue eyes]] and [[two-tone hair|two-tone]] [[short hair|short]] or [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair]] with [[blue hair|blue]] [[streaked hair|streaks]]. Her other hairstyles include a red [[hairclip]] or a [[two side up]] or [[twintails]] held up with [[crescent hair ornament|crescent hair ornaments]], and [[braided bangs]]. She also has a [[heart facial mark|heart]] or [[star facial mark]]

Her original outfit (post #4825285, post #4926779) consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[off-shoulder shirt|off-shoulder]] [[crop top]], covered by her characteristic [[fur-trimmed hood|fur-trimmed]] [[black jacket|black]] [[hooded jacket]] with [[wolf ears]] and [[blue jacket|blue]] [[two-sided jacket|lining]]. It also includes [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]] held with a [[white belt]], a [[black choker|black]] [[o-ring choker]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[cross-laced footwear|cross-laced]] [[fold-over boots]].

Her second outfit (post #5299540) consists of [[black shirt|black]] and [[blue shirt|blue]] crop top, a [[multicolored skirt|multicolored]] [[black skirt|black]] and [[blue skirt|blue]] [[layered skirt]] with [[frilled skirt|frills]], a [[black belt]] and a ripped [[back bow]]. Her legwear is [[asymmetrical legwear|asymmetrical]], a [[single thighhigh|single]] [[black thighhighs|black thighhigh]] with [[paw print|paw prints]] on one leg and a [[frilled thigh strap]] on the other. She sometimes wears a [[cropped jacket|cropped]] version of her hoodie and [[paw gloves]]. Her boots remain the same.

title: narantuya_(arknights)
body:
[i]The crimson Nightzmora Narantuya walks her own Khaganquest.[/i]

A playable Sniper Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: Narantuya Kapudan

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Sargon[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]May 26th[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Kuranta[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]177 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]12 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A former desert bandit and treasure hunter of Sargon, 
one of the few remaining Nightzmora descents, and the distant descendant of [[ Kharanduu Khagan (arknights)|]].
Now stationed long-term as a field Operator on Rhodes Island, 
as part of her race's coming-of-age conquering ceremony, the "Khaganquest".

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Yukino Satsuki]] (JP), Shao Minjia (CN), Elisabeth Snegir (EN), and Kim Soon-mi (KR). Her illustrator is [[banban_(vvvviiiiiia)|Banban]].

h4. Appearance

title: spinal_tap
body:
[b]This Is Spinal Tap[/b] is a 1984 American mockumentary comedy film co-written and directed by Rob Reiner. 

The film follows Martin "Marty" Di Bergi(Reiner), a documentary filmmaker who follows the fictional English Heavy Metal rock band, [b][i]Spinal Tap[/b][/i], during their American tour for their latest album [i]Smell the Glove[/i]. While the documentary follows the three most prominent members of the band, vocalist David St. Hubbins (Michael McKean), guitarist Nigel Tufnel(Christopher Guest) and bassist Derek Smalls(Harry Shearer), the film also show the eccentric and bizarre behavior of each member, the tour getting worse, and the ego and infighting by the band over their musical directions.

The film was a hit and well received by critics with several rock bands and singers like [[Ozzy Osbourne]] praising the film for showing the crazy life of rock bands on tour. A 2025 sequel titled [b]Spinal Tap II: The End Continues[/b], with most of the cast returning, has Marty making a new documentary where the members of Spinal Tap reunite for one final concert.

title: uh-60_blackhawk
body:
The Sikorsky UH-60 Black Hawk is a four-blade, twin-engine, medium-lift utility helicopter manufactured by Sikorsky Aircraft. 

Named after the Native American war leader Black Hawk, the UH-60A entered service with the U.S. Army in 1979, to replace the Bell UH-1 Iroquois as the Army's tactical transport helicopter. This was followed by the fielding of electronic warfare and special operations variants of the Black Hawk. 

Modified versions have also been developed for the U.S. Navy, Air Force, and Coast Guard. In addition to U.S. Army use, the UH-60 family has been exported to several nations. Black Hawks have served in combat during conflicts in Grenada, Panama, Iraq, Somalia, the Balkans, Afghanistan, and other areas in the Middle East.

h4. See also

* [[SH-60 Seahawk]] The naval version of the Black Hawk

title: girls_und_panzer
body:
A [[tank]] combat action anime series originally produced by Actas, with a Summer 2012-2014 manga by [[Saitaniya Ryouichi]], serialized in Media Factory's [i]Comic Flapper[/i]. It spawned a manga, light novel, video games, and several feature length films, as well as a promotional collaboration with [[World of Tanks]].

Many of the major characters' designs were handled by [[Shimada Fumikane]], while [[Nogami Takeshi]] designed some of the other characters.

The series primarily revolves around the non-lethal tank battle tournament dubbed the [i]sensha-do[/i] contested by various all-girl high school teams.

title: armored_core_vi:_fires_of_rubicon
body:
[b]Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon[/b], is a mecha combat videogame by [[Fromsoftware]] and published by Bandai Namco. The sixth numbered game of the [[Armored Core]] series and latest since 2013's [[Armored Core: Verdict Day]], the game was released on 25 August 2023 on for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S.

Set in the far future on the planet Rubicon 3, the planet was once rich with a substance called Coral that could be use as an energy source and data conduit. However, the Coral caused a cataclysmic event known as the Fires of Ibis, which engulfed the planet and the surrounding star system in flames. Fifty years later, Coral was once again discovered on Rubicon 3, leading to a war between the Corporations who want to mine Coral and the local government and people trying to stop them.

The player takes the role of [[621 (armored core vi)|621]], an augmented Armored Core pilot sent to Rubicon 3 by their boss, [[Handler Walter]], to work as a mercenary for the various factions in order to earn a new life for themselves.

h4. See also
* [[List of Armored Core VI characters and Mechanics]]
* [[30 Minutes Missions]]

title: you_have_no_real_friends_(meme)
body:
A [[meme]] referencing a [[Path of Exile 2]] stream done by [[Elon Musk]] on April 5th, 2025 via Twitter.  During the stream, the chat was spammed by multiple accounts, one of which spammed, "YOU HAVE NO REAL FRIENDS AND WILL DIE ALONE."  So far, most variants of the meme place a screenshot of that message being spammed above an image of a character with a background resembling the inside of Elon's private jet.

h4. External Links
* "Elon Musk's Twitter stream":[https://x.com/i/broadcasts/1mrGmPleodQKy]

body:
The main [[super robot]] [[mecha]] from [[Top wo Nerae!]], piloted by [[Takaya Noriko]] and [[Amano Kazumi]].

Gunbuster measures around 240 m tall. One of its most distinguishing features is its [[cyclops|cycloptic head]] featuring a singular [[purple eyes|purple eye]]. Naturally, it coined [[gunbuster pose|the cross-armed pose that's come to bear its name]].

title: naganami_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Naganami[/i]. Character design by [[Fujikawa]], voiced by [[Taketatsu Ayana]].

She has [[long hair|long]], [[two-tone hair]] that is [[black hair|black]] on the outside and [[pink hair|pink]] on [[colored inner hair|the inside]], [[yellow eyes]], and [[large breasts]]. She wears the standard [i]Yuugumo[/i]-class uniform: a purple [[halterneck]] [[pleated dress]] over a [[white shirt]], [[blue bowtie]], and [[grey pantyhose]] with a pair of [[lace-up boots]]. 

Her [[rigging]] is the same as the rest of the class: her funnel and foremast to her back, a 12.7 cm twin [[handgun]] mount, and two 61 cm quad [[torpedo tubes]] on [[thigh strap]]s.

title: ienaga_mugi
body:
A [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual YouTuber|VTuber]], part of the second wave. Character designed by [[Takehana Note]]. 

She is a Hikikomori middle school third-year who has [[blonde hair]] and [[brown eyes]], wears pink [[striped shirt|striped]] [[pajamas]] and [[headphones]], and has some talent in music (guitar and keyboard) and English. She broadcasts from over a [[safe (container)|safe]] in her closet.

title: mononobe_alice
body:
A [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]], part of it's [[2nd generation (nijisanji)|]]. 

A very young looking girl who claims to be in her first year of highschool. She's dressed in the image of [[Alice's Adventures in Wonderland]], with [[very long hair|very long]] [[blonde hair]] and two [[black bow|black]] [[hair bow|hair bows]].

title: nijisanji_fes_t-shirt
body:
A costume shared by all [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual YouTuber|VTuber]]s (including [[Virtuareal]]), used at Nijisanji Anniversary Festivals (also called Nijisanji Fes or NijiFes).

With a theme of a [[school festival]], members are sorted into one of seven classes named after the traditional colors of the rainbow. Each class wears a matching [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[print shirt|print]] [[t-shirt]]. The rest of each member's version of the costume is personal to them, often based on their default costume.

h4. Appearance

title: yuuhi_riri
body:
A [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]], part of Wave Two and designed by [[Nezumidoshi]]. Her name is displayed as [b]Yuhi Riri[/b] on her YouTube channel but her name is meant to be read as [b]Yuuhi Riri[/b], rendered on her Twitter. 

She is portrayed with [[pink hair]] and [[aqua eyes]], with two versions.

title: ushimi_ichigo
body:
[b]Ushimi Ichigo[/b] is a [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]]. Character designed by [[Methyl Key]].

She is portrayed with [[short hair|short]] [[pink hair]] and [[pink eyes]]. Her default outfit consists of a [[purple headwear|purple]] [[newsboy cap]], purple [[ascot]] and [[capelet]], [[puffy shorts]], and [[white thighhighs]]. 

She is presented in lore as an eight-year-old strawberry milk sea slug and made her debut on March 7th, 2018 with the rest of Nijisanji's second wave.

h4. Costumes

h5. Official costumes with a model

title: kabru
body:
Kabru is a "tallman*" adventurer in [[dungeon_meshi|Dungeon Meshi]]. In many regards, he is the polar opposite of [[laios touden|Laios]]; he has a deep contempt for monsters as a result of [spoilers]being orphaned by a dungeon whose monsters spilled out and killed everyone in his homeland[/spoilers]. He was raised by [[milsiril|an elf]] who taught him to be an exceptional fighter, however, that training appears to have only been applicable to human* opponents; he and his party lose frequently to monsters in the dungeon that the ostensibly-less-skilled party lead by Laios handle with relative ease.

[tn]* In Dungeon Meshi, the term "human" applies to many races: halflings, elves, dwarves, gnomes, etc., while the word "tallmen" is used to refer to what most fantasy settings simply call "humans".[/tn]

The majority of his "screentime" thus far has revolved around [spoilers]a time when he and [[Mithrun]] were separated from their respective parties and was forced to care for Mithrun. He consequently learned about the true danger of the dungeon.[/spoilers]

He has [[dark-skinned_male|dark skin]], [[curly_hair|curly]] [[black hair]], and [[blue eyes]], and wears a mix of [[leather armor]] and [[chainmail]].

h4. External links
* "Adventurer's Bible entry":[https://mangadex.org/chapter/2c49b74c-aac9-4f4d-b0cd-15117ee839ae]

title: shibuya_hajime
body:
A [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual Youtuber|VTuber]], part of the inaugural batch of eight. Designed by [[Hoojiro]]. 

He is portrayed as a young man with bright [[green hair]], [[blue eyes]], and is wearing [[glasses]]. 

His default attire consists of a black [[hood]]ed [[track jacket]], [[white shirt]] underneath, [[black pants]] with the left leg side [[pants rolled up|rolled up]], and [[slippers]]. body:

Despite her name being displayed as [b]Yuki Chihiro[/b], her name, translated as-is, is meant to be read as [b]Yuuki Chihiro[/b]. She "announced":[https://twitter.com/Chihiro_yuki23/status/1734469459237273748] her graduation from Nijisanji effective January 31, 2024. 

She was portrayed with [[long hair|long]] [[blue hair]] tied into [[twin braids]], and [[blue eyes]]. In addition, she also had an [[aged up]] version that varied per costume.

title: lisbeth_leonhart
body:
The protagonist of [[Goddess Order]].

She is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kaplan, a prosperous nation in the Ascalian continent famous for being a "nation of knights."

When the God of Ruin successfully destroyed the world in the 100th Year of the Goddess, the "Goddess of Light" Elizabeth sacrificed her life to ensure she sent both Lisbeth and the Goddess Order back to before everything went wrong. Now finding herself sent two years back in time, Lisbeth decides to go on a journey to "reclaim the lost future" by stomping out the dark prophecies foretold within the pages of the Goddess Order. 

[b]Character Details:[/b] 
[expand]
[b]Age[/b] | 18
[b]Race[/b] | Human
[b]Gender[/b] | Female
[b]Class[/b] | SSR Fighter
[b]Principle[/b] | Duty
[b]Weapon[/b] | Melee / Pointed Sword
[b]Allegiance[/b] | Kingdom of Kaplan
[b]Faction[/b] | Kaplan Royal Knights
[b]Birthday[/b] | Jan. 1

[/expand]

title: five-colored_flag
body:
The [b]Five-colored flag[/b] refers to the "Five Races Under One Union" flag, the official [[flag]] of the [[Kuomintang|Republic of China]] from 1912 until 1928. It consists of horizontal red, yellow, blue, white and black stripes, which represent that Han Chinese, Manchus, Mongols, Hui (Chinese Muslims) and Tibetans, considered at the time to be the primary ethnic groups of China.

The [[Manchukuo flag]] is a variant of this flag in which the red, blue, white and black stripes are the upper left quarter of the flag, while the rest is a yellow field. In this version the meaning of the black stripe is changed to represent Koreans.

h4. See also

* [[Hong Kong regional flag]]
* [[People's Republic of China flag]] (a.k.a. Chinese flag)
* [[Republic of China flag]] (a.k.a. Taiwanese flag)
* [[Manchukuo flag|Empire of Great Manchuria flag]] (a.k.a. Manchukuo flag)

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Five Races Under One Union":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Five_Races_Under_One_Union
* "Wikipedia: Flag of the Republic of China (History":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China#History
* "Wikipedia: List of Chinese flags":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Chinese_flags

title: lyra_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Lyra[/b], known as [b]Kotone[/b] in Japan, is the female player character in [i][[pokemon hgss|Pokémon HeartGold and SoulSilver]][/i].

This highly curious, active young Trainer cherishes the bonds she has with her Pokémon. She is always doting on them.

She has [[brown eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] worn in [[twintails]]. She wears a [[white hat|white]] [[newsboy cap]] with a [[red bow|red]] [[hat bow|bow]], a [[red shirt]], [[blue overalls]], [[white thighhighs]], [[red shoes|red]] [[shoes]], and carries a [[pokegear|Pokégear]] attached to a [[yellow bag]].

title: dwadge
body:
A fictional manned giant battle robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse. It first appeared in [[Gundam MSV]]. 

[b]MS-09G Dwadge[/b]

A modification of the [[Dom (mobile suit)|]] [[mobile_suit|MS]] intended as a specialist unit for desert operations, it is the final production model of all the Dom series. 

As well as the added dust proofing and dust filters, the units received head Vulcans, a refitted hard point for the heat saber on the backpack and a large [[Heat Hawk]] placed on the back of the waist when not in use. 

Some units carried rocket grenades that could be locked and thrown into the air towards their targets. While they weren't used in [[mobile_suit_gundam|The One Year War]], many units remained in hiding with [[Zeon]] remnants on Earth, being deployed by [[Neo Zeon]] in [[gundam _zz|The First Neo Zeon War]] and [[gundam_unicorn|the Third Neo Zeon War]] to great effect in desert operations.

h4. See also
* [[Dwadge Custom]]
* [[Pezun Dwadge]]

title: yazan_gable
body:
[quote][i]"I'M GOING TO VIOLATE YOU...!!!"[/i] - Yazan Gable[/quote]

A fictional [[Gundam]] character from [[Zeta Gundam]] and [[Gundam ZZ]]. 

In [i]Zeta[/i], he's a ferocious [[Titans (gundam)|]] [[war]] maniac whose skills allow him to go at it on par with multiple powerful Newtypes like [[Kamille Bidan]] and anihilate his enemies with ease, causing the demise of several members of the [[AEUG]] [spoiler](including [[Katz Howan|Katz Kobayashi]], [[Henken Bekkener]] and [[Emma Sheen]])[/spoiler]. 

Yazan has a [[turtle]] [[chest tattoo]] and he is most known for piloting the [[Gaplant]] and the [[Hambrabi]], from which he utters his infamous quote at Bidan. 

However, his fate drastically turns in [i]ZZ[/i], as his attempts at stealing the Zeta Gundam end up foiled repeatedly by [[Judau Ashta]], and the former ace of the Titans ends up left on the junker colony of Shangri-La, empoverished and in rags. [spoiler]A popular [[otaku|fan]] theory regarding Yazan's change in conduct explains that the long stasis inside his MS escape capsule caused momentary brain damage on him and dementia due to lack of oxygen, just like how it had happened to [[Tem Ray]] years before.[/spoiler]

Years later he [spoiler]apparently recuperates and[/spoiler] rejoins the [[Earth Federation]]. Yazan appears during the events of the manga [[MSV-R: The Return of Johnny Ridden]] as the captain of the EF Forces' MS squadron "Knight Jaeger", around the year 0090 of the Universal Century (2 years after ZZ), under the pseudonym [b]"Vasuki"[/b] (the name of Nagaraja, the king of the serpent gods in India). During this period he now pilots a heavily customized and revamped [[GM Night Seeker]] modified for close quarters combat and armed with a Fedayeen beam rifle (like the one he used in the Hambrabi).

title: chicago
body:
Use for posts centered around Chicago such as culture or locations in the city. 

The city of Chicago is the largest city in [[Illinois]], the United States. The city is the third-largest after [[Los Angeles]] and [[New York City]]. Also nicknamed the "Windy City", the city was first incorporated in 1837 on the shore of Lake Michigan. The city is known for its architecture and is also noted for its contributions to urban planning such as the City Beautiful movement. It would grow during the course of the 19th-century. 

In addition to being a major cultural, financial, and industrial hub, the city of Chicago is renowned for its cuisine. Examples include [[Chicago deep dish pizza]], Italian beef, the Chicago-style hot dog, and shaved ice. 

h5. Locations
[[Cloud gate]] 
[[John Hancock Center]]
[[Willis Tower]]
[[Two Prudential Plaza]]
[[Franklin Center]]

h4.See also
[[Chicago Police Department]]

title: los_angeles_clippers
body:
A professional basketball team based in Inglewood, [[California]], the [[United States]]. The Clippers compete in the [[National Basketball Association]] as part of the Pacific Division of the Western Conference. Previously, the team was known as the [[San Diego]] Clippers from 1978-1984. 

The team colors are Navy blue, ember red, Pacific blue, and silver.

[[Ayamy]]'s [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]] persona. 

In her VTuber form, she is portrayed with [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] with a [[side ponytail]] to her left, and [[blue eyes]].

Her default costume consists of a pink [[hair bow]], [[cat hair ornament]]s holding her ponytail, an [[x hair ornament]] to her right, and an orange-white [[hoodie]] with a paw print attachment on the pocket side.

Her second costume has her don [[twintails]] and a [[maid headdress]] hair bow, while she now sports a [[bare shoulders|bare-shoulder]] [[black dress]] with purple [[bow]]s and [[frills]], frilled [[wrist cuffs]], [[pantyhose]], and black [[loafers]].

title: zhang_jue_(fate)
body:
A Caster-class servant introduced in the [[Traum (fate/grand order)|]] singularity. He was the leader of the Yellow Turban rebellion detailed in the [[Romance of the Three Kingdoms]]. His name can also be read as Zhang Jiao.

In Traum, he appears as the military strategist for the Revenge Realm, working directly under [[Kriemhild (fate)|]]. [spoiler]In actuality, he is the mastermind behind the whole singularity, having been summoned by [[Specimen E]] to orchestrate it. To manage this, he creates [[clone]]s of himself while leaving his true body at [[Area 51]] to avoid the destruction of the singularity in the result of his death.[/spoiler]

[b]True Name:[/b] "Zhang Jue":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zhang_Jue

title: five_pebbles
body:
Five Pebbles is a [[Iterator (Rain World)|]] from the game [[Rain World]]. He is usually the second Iterator most players will meet, after [[Looks to the Moon]]

His puppet is a [[humanoid robot]] with [[pink skin]], antenna-like [[robot ears]] and markings above each eye of unequal length  vertical lines, (similar to a wireless signal strength indicator) and wears an [[orange robe]]. He is referred to with male pronouns.

He is haughty and arrogant, calling himself "god-like" in comparison to the player.

[spoiler]He is sufferring from [b][[rot_(rain_world)|The Rot]][/b], a kind of biomechanical cancer, which is slowly consuming his superstructure. The game's titular rain is produced by him continually flushing his systems with vast quantities of water in an attempt to purge the corruption.[/spoiler]

title: christopher_columbus_(fate)
body:
Rider-class Servant first seen in the Agartha chapter of [[Fate/Grand Order]], initially known as [b]Rider of the Resistance[/b]. The infamous explorer who made four trips across the Atlantic and discovered the Americas for Europeans to colonize. He was also known as a prolific slave trader. Often associated with the other male [[pirate]] servants in the game, like [[Edward Teach (fate)|]] and [[Bartholomew Roberts (fate)|]].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Moto Murabito]]
[b]Voice Actor:[/b] [[Ootsuka Houchuu]]

title: sherlock_holmes_(fate)
body:
Ruler-class Servant introduced in the [[Camelot (fate/grand order)|Sixth Singularity]] of [[Fate/Grand Order]]. The famous detective created by Sir [[Arthur Conan Doyle]], and arch-nemesis to [[James Moriarty (Archer) (fate)|James Moriarty]]. Holmes becomes part of the regular cast during FGO's second major story arc. [spoiler]Dies during [[Traum (fate/grand order)|]] in combat with [[James Moriarty (Ruler) (fate)|]], after realizing he was a [[Foreign Disciples (fate/grand order)|Foreign Disciple]].[/spoiler]

title: jaguarman_(fate)
body:
A Lancer-class Servant first appearing in [[Fate/Grand Order]]'s [[Babylonia (fate/grand order)|]] singularity. Renamed [b]Jaguar Warrior[/b] in the English version. A Central and South American divine spirit representing war and death, inhabiting the body of [[Fujimura Taiga]] as a Pseudo-Servant.

Due to her host body's name, she often incorporates tiger puns in addition to jaguar puns. Wears a [[kigurumi]] [[onesie]] in her first two ascensions, while her third ascension is a reference to [[Fujimura Raiga]]'s background as a [[yakuza]]. Wields a [[club (weapon)|]] on a long [[polearm|pole]] in her first two ascensions and a [[naginata]] in her third.

Considered a different character than Taiga for tagging purposes. Only tag both if both are in the image. The two can be distinguished by Jaguarman's [[extra ears|extra]] [[cat ears]].

[b]Character Design:[/b] [[Aotsuki Takao]]
[b]Voice Actress:[/b] [[Itou Miki]]

title: deku_fighting_street_tiers_(meme)
body:
A meme originating from the [[Death Battle]] episode [[Spider-Man (Miles Morales)]] vs [[Midoriya Izuku|Deku]], which gained notoriety on sites like [[Twitter]] after the episode's release in July 2025. 

Originally a form of slander from claims that Deku had to resort to fighting weaker "street-tier" characters to win a fight after he lost his previous match on Death Battle against [[Asta (Black Clover)|]], the meme soon evolved into depicting Deku as a bloodthirsty "street slasher" hunting down weaker characters, and further into jokes about Deku being able to defeat any character on a street.

h4. External links
* "Know Your Meme: Deku Fighting Street Tiers":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/deku-fighting-street-tiers-spider-man-vs-deku-death-battle]
* "Spider-Man VS Deku (Marvel VS My Hero Academia) | DEATH BATTLE!":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cE8Q2ndvOWU]

title: agent_3_(splatoon_3)
body:
The Protagonist of [[Splatoon 3]]'s main storyline. Not to be confused with [[Agent 3 (splatoon)|]] from [[Splatoon 1]].

Agent 3 is an [[inkling]], but their appearance is subject to the player's choice. Most commonly, they are depicted as they appear in promotional material, in a character officially dubbed as [[VeronIKA (splatoon)|]]. That is, a girl with [[long hair|long]], [[asymmetrical hair|asymmetrical]] [[blonde hair]], with a [[single_braid|single braid]], and [[yellow eyes]]. 

They are most often depicted with the [[tri-stringer (splatoon)|]] or [[hero shot (splatoon 3)|]] weapon, and an [[ink tank (splatoon)|]] on their back. They are also often accompanied by a [[Smallfry (splatoon)|]] companion.

Their outfit changes during gameplay; some examples can be seen in the images below.

h4. Official art
* !asset #30525827: [[Torn shirt]], [[sweatpants]] and [[bandaged foot|bandaged feet]]
* !asset #30526202: [[White shirt]], [[bike shorts]] and [[boots]]

title: midair
body:
When a character is seen fully on the air, not touching the ground or any support.

The character should be in a setting which clearly shows that they're floating in the air compare to their surroundings, if not, simply use [[floating]], [[flying]] or [[jumping]] as applicable. Don't use this tag on background-less or otherwise ambiguous settings.

She has [[long hair|long]], [[messy hair|messy]] [[blonde hair]] in a [[mullet]] with a [[side braid]] and a [[half up braid]], [[blue eyes]] with prominent [[bags under eyes|bags under them]], and a [[lip piercing]].

Mary usually wears a puffy [[vest]] over a green [[plaid shirt]], [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[knee boots]].

title: goddess_order
body:
A Korean tag-team side-scrolling action role-playing gacha game developed by PIXELTRIBE (formerly Loadcomplete's CREPE Team, which previously developed [[Crusaders Quest]]) and published by Kakao Games. Currently soft-launched in certain countries with its 0.1.0 release on June 24, 2025, it's slated to fully release globally sometime in September 2025.

Players take on the role of Princess [[Lisbeth Leonhart]], a knightly princess who finds herself sent two years back in time by the Goddess of Light following a hopeless battle against the God of Ruin for the fate of the world. Armed with the Goddess Order, a divine tome of prophecies containing the tragedies and the knowledge of the previous timeline, she sets forth on a world-spanning journey to avert every dark prophecy that is yet to unfold, alongside her friends, both old and new, and her very own Knight Order.

"Official website.":[https://goddessorder.kakaogames.com/]

title: gambling
body:
To play a game of chance for money or other stakes. A person will risk money or other items of value to play a game of luck and chance, hoping that they will win and earn money/items of higher value than what was risked.

Various games are designed for gambling purposes, and an institution that employs people to deal in these games are called [[casino|casinos]].

title: petronas
body:
[b]Petronas (Petroliam Nasional Berhad)[/b] is Malaysia's national oil and gas company, established in 1974. Fully owned by the Malaysian government, Petronas is a global energy group engaged in a wide range of petroleum-related operations, including exploration, production, refining, and distribution. It is one of the largest and most profitable corporations in Southeast Asia, with a significant international presence.

Petronas is widely recognized on the global stage as the title sponsor and technical partner of the [b]Mercedes-AMG Petronas Formula One Team[/b]. This partnership, which began in 2010, has become one of the most successful in modern F1 history, playing a key role in the team's dominance during the turbo-hybrid era. Petronas provides advanced fuel and lubricants technology, contributing to Mercedes’ record-breaking performance and multiple Constructors’ and Drivers’ Championships.

h4. Notable Drivers:

* [[George Russell]]
* [[Andrea Kimi Antonelli]] 
* [[Lewis Hamilton]] 
* [[Valtteri Bottas]] 
* [[Nico Rosberg]]

title: james_cameron's_avatar
body:
[b]Avatar[/b] is a film franchise written, designed, and directed by [[James Cameron]]. Spawning out of the 2009 film [[Avatar (2009 movie)|]], the franchise's title refers to the genetically engineered Na'vi clones that serve as avatars to the minds of remotely located humans, and are used to interact with the natives and environment of Pandora in the first movie. The franchise follows the [[Na'vi]], a humanoid alien species indigenous to Pandora, and [[Jake Sully]], who is the titular Avatar.

Not to be confused with Nickelodeon's [[Avatar Legends]].

h4. Entries

* [[Avatar (2009 movie)|]] (2009)
* [[Avatar: The Way of Water]] (2022)
* [[Avatar: Fire and Ash]] (2025)

title: beelzebumon
body:
The Ultimate form of [[Impmon]], the "Evil Digimon", one of the Seven Great Demon Lords, representing the Sin of Gluttony. Dual-wielding its double-barrelled shotguns named "Berenjena" (Eggplant), it is renowned as the "Duelist of Finality" (最後の決闘者, [i]Saigo no Duelist[/i]). A prominent character in [[Digimon Tamers]]. 

Beelzebumon can Mode Change to [[Beelzebumon Blast Mode]], in which its right hand becomes a [[arm cannon|cannon]] named the Blaster, it sprouts four black [[wings]] from its back and its [[red eyes]] become [[green eyes|green]]. 

Beelzebumon is referred to as [b]Beelzemon[/b] in English material.

title: sasaki_akebi
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Gunner of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Sasaki Setsuko[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a member of the 1964 Japanese Olympic gold-medal winning team.

Voiced by [[Nakamura Sakura]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

A gentle personality with lots of patience. The hairband holding back her forelock is her main charmpoint. Her role is the Blocker.

[tn]Source: post #1291300[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Duck's gunner. In volleyball, blocking is her specialty. Has a high degree of accuracy, but due to the weakness of the gun she has trouble getting effective shots in.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Operation More Love Love

A member of Team Duck, her trademark is her hairband. Although she appears easygoing, she also has a cheerful side. While she values her interactions with Chi-Hatan Academy, she hopes to get them to join the volleyball club if possible.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: kawanishi_shinobu
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Driver of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Kasai Masae[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a member of the 1964 Japanese Olympic gold-medal winning team.

Voiced by [[Kirimura Mari]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Has a positive nature, but is also quick to temper. Despite her fierce expression, she has a good personality.  Is the Attacker.

[tn]Source: post #1291299[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Duck's driver. Her position is attacker. Is calm and patient. Her arm control has gotten better through all of the matches.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Operation More Love Love

A member of Team Duck, she is positive but has a short temper. She also respects her captain, Isobe, but still points out her mistakes. Hit it off with Fukuda from Chi-Hatan Academy and became friends, however...

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: kondou_taeko
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Radio Operator of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Kondou Taeko[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a member of the 1964 Japanese Olympic gold-medal winning team.

Voiced by [[Yoshioka Maya]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Works hard at everything, but at times cannot read the atmosphere. Her headband is her trademark.  With her forte being the Jump Serve, will decide things when it counts with a Service Ace.

[tn]Source: post #1291298[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Duck's radio operator. With her trademark red headband, she is good at the jump serve. She also has the role of the calm tsukkomi.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Operation More Love Love

A member of Team Duck, her trademark is her headband. Like Isobe, her current goal is to revive the volleyball club. Although she works hard at everything she does, she sometimes can't discern the difference between a volleyball and a round person......?

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: isobe_noriko
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander, loader and leader of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team. Also the Captain of the Volleyball Club.

Named after [b]Isobe Sata[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a member of the 1964 Japanese Olympic gold-medal winning team.

Voiced by [[Kikuchi Mika]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Is staking it all on tankery in order to revive the Volleyball Club. For her role as Setter, she practices tosses everyday.

[tn]Source: post #1291296[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team.  Boards the Type 89 I-Gou Kou as the tank commander and loader of Team Duck, i.e. those of the former Volleyball Club. A hot-blooded girl engaging in tankery in order to revive the volleyball club. As a Setter, she practices tosses every day, with her motto being "[b]GUTS[s] [/s]!![/b]".

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Operation More Love Love

The leader of Team Duck, who is desperate to revive the disbanded volleyball club. Enthusiastic to show the world her skills in sports exams! She now thinks that even students from other schools are welcome to join the volleyball club.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]
